title: Replace company logo image in Hero section

requirements.text: Replace the company logo image located at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1] in the Hero section with a new company logo for J M Construction
acceptanceCriteria: The new logo image replaces the existing image element at the specified XPath location
The logo maintains appropriate dimensions and styling consistent with the Hero section design
The logo is clearly visible against the Hero section background

constraints: Only modify the image element at the specified XPath location in the Hero section
Maintain the existing Hero section layout and styling
Preserve all other Hero section elements (company name, location, tagline, stats, CTA button)
nonGoals: Changing any other images or elements on the page
Modifying the Hero section layout or structure

required: Professional company logo for J M Construction, a sanitary and plumbing contractor, featuring construction-related imagery with warm, earthy tones matching the site's brown/orange color scheme (jm-logo.dim_200x200.png)
